sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Review relative clause vocabulary:

story → ?      picture → ?
music → ?      poem → ?

(Answers: lisri, pixra, zgike, pemci)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
jmina x1 adds x2 to x3 by amount x4 add/increase
vimcu x1 removes x2 from x3 remove/subtract

What Are Logical Connectives?

Logical connectives join words or phrases with specific logical meanings. Today we learn .e — the basic "and" for sumti.

The Sumti Connective .e

.e connects two sumti that share the same relationship:

mi .e do cu klama

I and you go. (Both of us go.)

la .alis. .e la .bob. cu tavla

Alice and Bob talk.

More Examples

lo gerku .e lo mlatu cu melbi

Dogs and cats are beautiful.

mi viska lo cukta .e lo penbi

I see the book and the pen.

Key Point

.e means both sumti have the same relationship to the selbri. "A and B do X" = A does X, and B does X.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Use .e

Translate:

  1. I and you are happy.
  2. Alice and Bob go.
  3. The dog and the cat are big.
Answers
  1. mi .e do cu gleki
  2. la .alis. .e la .bob. cu klama
  3. lo gerku .e lo mlatu cu barda

Exercise 2: New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. I add water.
  2. You remove the book.
  3. Alice adds and Bob removes.
Answers
  1. mi jmina lo djacu
  2. do vimcu lo cukta
  3. la .alis. cu jmina .i la .bob. cu vimcu

items.text: The dog and the cat are big.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "You and I talk." → mi .e do cu tavla
  2. "I add." → mi jmina
  3. "Dogs and cats are good." → lo gerku .e lo mlatu cu xamgu

Summary

You learned .e to connect sumti with "and" meaning. Both sumti share the same relationship to the selbri.

Tomorrow preview: Other sumti connectives — .a, .o, .u.
